fields.heroTitle: Freshworks customers get a $500 signup bonus and waived card fees for life
fields.descriptionTitle: The first corporate card for startups and ecommerce businesses

content.value: Brex is the first card for startups and ecommerce businesses, with higher limits, no personal guarantee or security deposit required, and the most competitive rewards program on the market. You can apply online in 5 minutes and get a virtual card instantly. Questions? Get dedicated support at freshworks@brex.com

fields.legalNotice: This offer is only valid for new Brex customers. Statement credit requires that customers spend at least $1,000 on their Brex card and is provided in the form of 50,000 Rewards points, redeemable for statement credit on any transaction.
